column4: does anyone know if wifi works out of the box with the eee pc 1000he?
yep
yep1
seriously? is it a native driver?
i'm on it now
on my EEE
dad: i'm thinking about getting a 1000he, but i'm just concerned about how easy it is to setup the hardware (touchpad, buttons, etc). any advice?
everything works out of the box.
and you have a 1000he?
the camera and bluetooth is turned off in the BIOS, but everything else works.
yes
do those components work when turned on?
dad just said he was having problems with the buttons. any input on that?
which buttons?
does the volume control use the OSD?
the FN+F11/F12 (volume up, volume down, respectively) controls the volume levels by default
and that all works as expected, and uses the OSD?
yep
anything else to be aware of? i'm really trying to find an easy piece of hardware to install to
I have not run into any quirks, everything is excellent.  i'm on mine now.  Also, the advanced desktop effects even look surprisingly good.
see my private message
also note https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport/Machines/Netbooks states there is a recording problem but I haven't been effected by it at all, hopefully your dad wont eitther
